title: Mr Horatio Knibbles
creator_credit: Anvil Films, Hugh Stewart and Robert Hird
brief_description: Mr. Horatio Knibbles is a magic rabbit that only Mary Bunting can see. Mary’s mother’s jewellery goes missing but with the help of Mr. Knibbles and his friends, Squirrel Postman, Air Mail Pigeon and Mrs. Magpie, the real culprit is found. A live action fantasy. Cast includes Anthony Shepard as Horatio Knibbles, Lesley Roach, Gary Smith, Rachel Brennock, John Ash, Nigel Chivers. From an original story by Wallace Bosco.
